We had a great time at Angie & Javier's place. The place was easy to find and is situated in a quiet affluent neighborhood of San Pedro Garza Garcia in Monterrey.
Upon arrival, Angie was waiting to greet us outside and let us into the gated parking area for the building. She brought us up in the elevator to the 6th floor and acquainted us with the apartment. After familiarizing us with the ACs and TVs, Angie showed us around the well equipped kitchen. From the kitchen you can see beautiful views of the city and the Sierra Madre mountains that surround Monterrey. There is a clicker to open and close the gated parking area which made things very easy when driving in and out of the property. The view out of the apartment is to the south so you never have the problem of the sun blaring in your face at sunset.
The apartment is very spacious and fit our family of 5 comfortably with plenty of room to relax. All of the beds are extremely comfortable and you can tell that Angie and Javier invested in good mattresses. The place is very quiet and all of us slept great throughout our entire trip. We took an Uber a couple of times and it was easy for the driver to find the place with no problems. If you need any items from the store, there is a small convenience store (OXXO) within a two minute walk from the apartment.
If we are ever back in Monterrey, we will stay here again. Thanks for a great experience!
